title: Telemetry Event v1 (Deterministic)
description: A telemetry event with a deterministic ID derived from content, not RNG.

event_id.description: Deterministic event ID: EVT-<hash8> derived from (event_type + run_id + payload canonical).

run_id.description: The sealed run ID this event belongs to.

observed_at.description: Wall-clock timestamp (excluded from event ID derivation).

payload.description: Event-specific payload data included in the deterministic hash.
